amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $150,000 in funding for the Historic Fort Payne Coal and Iron Building Rehabilitation and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part C of House Report 111-184 to strike the $150,000 in funding for the Historic Fort Payne Coal and Iron Building Rehabilitation and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 317 (Roll no. 474).
